net.semanticmetadata.lire.imageanalysis.features.local.shapecontext

Class ShapeContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.semanticmetadata.lire.imageanalysis.features.local.shapecontext.ShapeContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FeatureVector, LireFeature, LocalFeature

    public class ShapeContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements LocalFeature
    Created by Lukas Knoch on 16.09.15. This class represents a ShapeContext feature. The comparison for this local feature is not implemented as it is only used for creating the Shapeme descriptor.

        public void setByteArrayRepresentation(byte[] bytes)
        Description copied from interface: LireFeature

      • setByteArrayRepresentation

        public void setByteArrayRepresentation(byte[] bytes,
                                       int i,
                                       int i1)
        Description copied from interface: LireFeature
        Sets the feature vector values based on the byte[] data. Use LireFeature.getByteArrayRepresentation() to generate a compatible byte[] array.
        Specified by:
        setByteArrayRepresentation in interface LireFeature
        Parameters:
        bytes - the byte[] array containing the data.
        i - the offset, i.e. where the feature vector starts.
        i1 - the length of the data representing the feature vector.
        See Also:
        LireFeature.getByteArrayRepresentation()
